title: Who is the best LCS team?
body: Who is the best LCS team in your opinion guys.

replies.body:
The "LCS" is only North American and Europe.

So Korea's LCK is excluded, so it the LPL and LMS. In that case the debate would have to be between

- TSM, C9, CLG, TIP, FNC, SK, H2K

The best team in the LCS right now is probably TSM, if I had to rank the top 5 teams in the LCS it'd go like this.

1. TSM (Consistently at the top, coupled with their recent impressive performance)
2. SK (Really strong this season, underperformed recently but probably still equal to TSM)
3. CLG (Strong team, no weak roles, decent at worst)
4. FNC (Strong team all around, but no ace)
5. TIP (Getting used to their new line-up, stepping up recently, if they were more consistent could be #3 on this list)
Tsm all the way turtle, lustboy, dyrus,bjergsen and Santorin are unstoppable. #GOTSM
I think TSM is doing best NA and EU wise, but if i chose the  best underdog/upcoming team, it would probably be Origen GG and maybe Elements. :D
GE Tigers, EDG, yoe Flash wolves. But I think to think TPA. TPA 16-3

> [{quoted}](name=Hi Im Azir,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=pEPs9OAP,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-03-20T01:23:29.615+0000)
>
> GE Tigers, EDG, yoe Flash wolves. But I think to think TPA. TPA 16-3

He said NA. Not world.
He said LCS which is NA/EU.

I have to admit it's TSM right now. I hope CLG surpasses them, I do think CLG has better individual play. If CLG work on the teamfights, they can be the best. Right now, CLG, SK, TSM, FNC, and H2K are looking great as well as team liquid when they played with keith.

I was REALLY hoping that SK and TSM would matchup at Katowice to get a head to head comparison, considering TSM didn't drop a match the whole tourney and SK was dropped in the group stage though, TSM is definitely the best team in the West BY FAR (kappa). TiP looks to be figuring things out really well, and CLG have been super consistent in skill and play style all split. Considering recent western success, I am so hyped for the MSI!
